title: Saint Seiya: Meiou Hades Elysion-hen
title_en: Saint Seiya: The Hades Chapter - Elysion
title_jp: 聖闘士星矢 冥王ハーデス エリシオン編
synopsis: After the 12 Gold Saints sacrifice their lives to destroy the Wailing Wall, The Bronze Saints enter the deepest realm of the Underworld, Elysion, where they face off aganist Hades's two most powerful servants: The Twin Gods, Hypnos and Thanatos, before they can reach Hades for the final battle.
